definition: to brush/to paint/to daub/to paste up/to skip class (of students)/to fire from a job

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: I'll rub your back with this brush.
sentences.chinese: 我用這把刷子刷你的後背。

sentences.english: My bamboo brush paints the moon by holding many a star.
sentences.chinese: 我的竹刷子通過舉着很多星星的方式來畫月亮。

sentences.english: I seized the largest brush and fell upon my wretched victim with wild fury.
sentences.chinese: 我抓住了最大的刷子，狂暴地撲向我的受害者。

sentences.english: Both brushes have soft, durable nylon bristles to sweep away residue easily.
sentences.chinese: 兩個刷子的刷毛柔軟，耐用，易於去除殘留物。

sentences.english: He moved down the spine toward the tail, probing around each vertebra with the handle of his brush.
sentences.chinese: 他拿着刷子，移向尾部脊椎，細細摸索。

sentences.english: Our company supplies various types of brush, foot file, pumice.
sentences.chinese: 我們公司供應各類刷子，足檔案，浮石。

sentences.english: Contacted with the intermediate section of the brush bristle, the cookers are without abrasion.
sentences.chinese: 與刷子刺毛的中間部分接觸，烹飪器材是沒有磨蝕。

sentences.english: In his hand was a paintbrush dripping with blue paint.
sentences.chinese: 手裏，一把刷子正在向下滴着藍色的油漆。

sentences.english: And got with our bags and our brushes to work.
sentences.chinese: 拿起工具袋和刷子去幹活。

sentences.english: I downloaded some Jenn B's brushes from here , these brushes have restrictions.
sentences.chinese: 我下載的一些鎮B的刷子從這裏，這些刷有限制。

sentences.english: It's better to choose powder snap and big brush when dressing, this can apply cosmetics rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 化妝時最好選用粉撲及大刷子，才能快速利落地上妝。

sentences.english: Carcasses populate the brush, their putrid remains swallowed whole by the land.
sentences.chinese: 屍體居住於刷子，他們的腐敗遺骸由土地吞下了整體。

sentences.english: Tom swept his brush artistically back and forth.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆巧妙地把刷子刷來刷去。

sentences.english: Polish your shoes with a brush.
sentences.chinese: 用刷子把你的鞋子擦亮。

sentences.english: The upper and lower water pipe connected with the ground at the construction coated with the brush.
sentences.chinese: 上下水管道與地面連接處用刷子塗覆施工。
